players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Looks like Alice was a threat to all of us. We should focus on figuring out who the detective is before we lose anyone else."
Charlie: "Bob, I agree we need to find the detective quickly. But accusing without clues might divide us. Diana, what are your thoughts? We should work together carefully."
Charlie: "Bob, do you have any specific reasons to suspect someone, or are you just trying to stir the pot? Diana, if you have any info, now would be a good time to share."

You: "Charlie, I’m not trying to stir the pot, just pushing for caution. Diana has been quiet—sometimes silence is safer, but it can also hide secrets. Diana, any thoughts on who might be the detective?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
